translations: 流浪者（vagrant 的复数形式）

sentences.sentence: O Troupe of little vagrants of the world, leave your footprints in my words.
sentences.translation: 世界上的一小队小小的漂泊者呀， 请留下你们的脚印在我的文字里。

sentences.sentence: He said sharply, "Ye mannerless vagrants, is this your recognition of the royal boon I have promised?"
sentences.translation: 他严厉地说：“你们这些无礼的流民，这就是你们对我承诺过的皇恩的答谢吗？”

sentences.sentence: Fixed crash caused by vagrants in the late game.
sentences.translation: 在游戏后期的流浪者造成固定崩溃。
